articles.title: Among Us was the world's most downloaded mobile game in October - Dot Esports
articles.description: The game was downloaded nearly 75 million times.
articles.content:
For the second month in a row, Among Us became the most downloaded mobile game worldwide, according to estimates from analytics company Sensor Tower.

articles.title: Video Game Maker Ubisoft's Montreal Office Evacuated After Hoax Hostage Call - NDTV
articles.description: Police on Friday evacuated a building housing French video game maker Ubisoft's Montreal offices after receiving a hostage call which turned out to be a hoax.
articles.content:
The center of the police operation was the building that houses Ubisoft's Montreal offices.
